meta.title: Radio City Music Hall | Iconic NYC Attractions
meta.description: Rock Center has the best things to do in NYC. Top attractions, best skyline views from the Top of the Rock, The Rink, Rainbow Room, art, history, great dining and shopping.

heroCTA.title: Hall of fame.
heroCTA.bodyCopy: Famous for its history, its architecture, its entertainment — no trip to Rockefeller Center is complete without visiting Radio City Music Hall.

crossLinks.title: The Holidays

image.alt: The famous Rockefeller Center Christmas Tree and Prometheus sculpture by The Rink.

crossLinks.caption: Celebrate the holidays with us. It's a tradition that's become as familiar as 'ho, ho, ho!'

image.alt: Ice skaters on the rink at Rockefeller Center

crossLinks.title: The Rink
crossLinks.caption: Nothing says “Holidays in New York” quite like a trip around the iconic rink underneath the Christmas Tree and the Prometheus statue.

imageCallout.title: Christmas Spectacular
imageCallout.description: Christmas Spectacular Starring the Radio City Rockettes presented by Chase is a one-of-a-kind holiday celebration that brings together family, friends, and loved ones. You’ll be dazzled by the Rockettes’ brilliant dance numbers and by Radio City aglow with the joy of the season. Currently canceled for the 2020 holiday season, the Christmas Spectacular hopes to return in 2021.

cards.title: Radio City Stage Door Tour
cards.description: Go behind-the-scenes at Radio City Music Hall, and discover why it’s called the “Showplace of the Nation.” This 75-minute comprehensive tour even includes meeting a Rockette.

cards.title: Radio City Sweets & Gifts
cards.description: The show never ends with keepsakes, souvenirs, and sweets you can bring home to enjoy anytime you want.
